verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Thus saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Let|strong="H5186"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w But|strong="H4325"\w* if thou wilt \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* behold \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w strike|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H5927"\w* thy coasts \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w river|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* forth \w an|strong="H5921"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*: \w which|strong="H6854"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w enter|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* thy house, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy bedchamber, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy bed, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* houses \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy servants, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w people|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* thy ovens, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* remains \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy meats;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* come \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* thy servants.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Aaron, Stretch forth thy hand \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w streams|strong="H2975"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* pools, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* bring forth \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron stretched \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hand upon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* waters \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* frogs \w came|strong="H0559"\w* up, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w the|strong="H0559"\w* land \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* magicians \w also|strong="H7535"\w* \w by|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* enchantments \w did|strong="H7535"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* manner, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* brought forth \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* upon \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt.

\w But|strong="H0834"\w* Pharao \w called|strong="H6817"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: Pray ye \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Pharao: \w Set|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* time \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* pray \w for|strong="H1004"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* thy servants, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* thy people, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* driven \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thy servants, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thy people: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* remain only \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* river.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* answered: Tomorrow. But \w he|strong="H0853"\w* said: \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* do according \w to|strong="H0776"\w* thy word; \w that|strong="H0776"\w* thou mayst know \w that|strong="H0776"\w* there \w is|strong="H0776"\w* none \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H0776"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* frogs \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* depart \w from|strong="H8085"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* thy house, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* thy servants, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w people|strong="H0834"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* only \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w river|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* forth \w from|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* cried \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w promise|strong="H3068"\w*, which \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* frogs.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* word \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Moses: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* frogs died \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* houses, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* villages, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fields:

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* gathered \w them|strong="H0853"\w* together \w into|strong="H1961"\w* immense heaps, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w was|strong="H1961"\w* corrupted.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Pharao seeing \w that|strong="H0834"\w* rest \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w given|strong="H8085"\w*, \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H2388"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Aaron, \w Stretch|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* thy rod, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* strike \w the|strong="H0559"\w* dust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* earth: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* sciniphs \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w*. \w And|strong="H1004"\w* Aaron \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hand, holding \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rod: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* struck \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dust|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* came sciniphs \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* beasts: \w all|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dust|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w turned|strong="H1004"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* sciniphs \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* magicians \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* enchantments practiced \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* manner, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* sciniphs, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w could|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* sciniphs \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* beasts.

\w And|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* magicians said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Pharao \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* finger \w of|strong="H7760"\w* God. \w And|strong="H2088"\w* Pharao heart \w was|strong="H1961"\w* hardened, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H2088"\w* hearkened \w not|strong="H2088"\w* unto \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H1961"\w* commanded.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Moses: Arise early, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w stand|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Pharao: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* forth \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* waters: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt say \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3651"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0559"\w* if thou wilt \w not|strong="H0776"\w* let \w them|strong="H0413"\w* go, behold \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* send \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* thy servants, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* thy houses all kind \w of|strong="H0776"\w* flies: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* houses \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Egyptians \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* filled \w with|strong="H0413"\w* flies \w of|strong="H0776"\w* divers kinds, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* wherein \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Gessen wherein \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*, wonderful \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* lay, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* flies \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w a|strong="H2076"\w* division between \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w people|strong="H0834"\w*: tomorrow \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* sign \w be|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* very grievous swarm \w of|strong="H0430"\w* flies \w into|strong="H6547"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* houses \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Pharao \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H6547"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w was|strong="H3068"\w* corrupted \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* kind \w of|strong="H0430"\w* flies.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Pharao \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* land.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w It|strong="H3068"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3318"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* we \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifice \w the|strong="H0413"\w* abominations \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Egyptians \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: now if we kill \w those|strong="H5973"\w* \w things|strong="H5973"\w* which \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Egyptians worship, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w presence|strong="H5973"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w us|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w We|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5493"\w* three days’ journey \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath commanded \w us|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* Pharao said: \w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H3513"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wilderness: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* farther: pray \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

And Moses said: I will go out from thee, and will pray to the Lord: and the flies shall depart from Pharao, and from his servants, and from his people tomorrow: but do not deceive any more, in not letting the people go to sacrifice to the Lord.
So Moses went out from Pharao, and prayed to the Lord.
And he did according to his word: and he took away the flies from Pharao, and from his servants, and from his people: there was not left so much as one.
And Pharao’s heart was hardened, so that neither this time would he let the people go.
